title: Targeting MAFB potentiates immune checkpoint inhibitor efficacy by reprogramming tumor-associated macrophages to an M1-like phenotype in colorectal cancer.
key_takeaway: MAFB targeting enhances checkpoint inhibitors by promoting M1 macrophages.
summary_background: Colorectal cancer treatment with checkpoint inhibitors can be enhanced by targeting MAFB to reprogram TAMs.
summary_methods: In vivo and in vitro experiments using CRC models.
strengths: Targeting MAFB improves checkpoint inhibitor efficacy via TAM reprogramming.

title: Mafb deficiency in myeloid cells increases susceptibility to Mycobacterium tuberculosis infection in mice.
key_takeaway: MAFB deficiency in myeloid cells increases TB susceptibility.
summary_background: Role of MAFB in myeloid cells during TB infection.
summary_methods: Mouse model of M. tuberculosis infection.
summary_conclusion: MAFB is crucial for myeloid cell function against TB.

title: Atypical Early Presentation of Multicentric Carpotarsal Osteolysis: Ankle Pain and Cavovarus Deformity Without Osteolysis.
key_takeaway: Early MCTO presentation without osteolysis in a patient with MAFB variant.
summary_background: Case study of early MCTO symptoms.
summary_conclusion: Importance of early diagnosis in MCTO.
next_action: Review patient data for similar cases.

title: Autoimmune neuroinflammation leads to neuronal death via MIF nuclease-mediated parthanatos.
key_takeaway: MIF mediates neuronal death in autoimmune neuroinflammation via parthanatos.
summary_background: Role of MIF in neuroinflammation and neuronal damage.
summary_results: Increased neuronal death with MIF activation.
summary_conclusion: MIF inhibition reduces neuroinflammation and death.

title: Nanotherapeutic Macrophage-Neuro Reprogramming Through Immunometabolic Crosstalk Mitigates Sepsis-Induced Lung Injury and Neurologic Damage.
key_takeaway: Nanotherapeutic approach reprograms macrophages to mitigate sepsis effects.
summary_background: Nanotherapeutics targeting macrophage-neuro crosstalk in sepsis.
summary_results: Reduced lung and neurologic damage with treatment.
summary_conclusion: Effective nanotherapeutic strategy for sepsis-related injuries.

title: Effect of Bacillus Subtilis BN Strain on M1 Macrophage Antiviral Response.
key_takeaway: Bacillus Subtilis enhances antiviral response in M1 macrophages.
summary_background: Role of Bacillus Subtilis in immune responses.
summary_conclusion: Bacillus Subtilis boosts M1 macrophage antiviral activity.
